name: CreateMultipleListings
description:
Create multiple listings in a single request.

Use this tool to add several listings to the CRM in one operation. Ideal for bulk uploads or extensive data entry tasks.

parameters.name: listings_data
parameters.description: JSON array containing data for each listing to be created. Each entry should include details like 'associations', 'objectWriteTraceId', and 'properties'.

associationCategory.description: The category of the association, such as "HUBSPOT_DEFINED".

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the specific type of association.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

associationCategory.description: The category of the association, such as "HUBSPOT_DEFINED".

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the specific type of association.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
